com.vernalis.knime.internal.flowcontrol.nodes.wait.abstrct

Class AbstractWaitNodeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.node.NodeModel
      • com.vernalis.knime.internal.flowcontrol.nodes.wait.abstrct.AbstractWaitNodeModel

  • public class AbstractWaitNodeModel
extends org.knime.core.node.NodeModel
    Abtsract class for the Wait nodes. Subclasses should implement RunForTime or RunToTime.
    Author:
    S.Roughley
